TopicTitle: An attachment node for the claw

Articles.Content:
I have used the claw to make some machines, but getting things set up is way too hard.

What if we could have a tweakable to set it to start open, then once you do that, it gives you a node to attach stuff to it?

Ignore the possible grammatical errors above

Possibly a better idea would be a separate "hinge" part that has the same hinging behavior as the claw, but has attachment nodes on both sides.

Also, I know that tweakables are currently not a priority, but by the time 1.0 comes around, I would love to see an amount of tweakability matching or surpassing that of the TweakableEverything mod
Yeah, but isn't it like an instant fix if you just make a tweakable for it?
In a sense, but people may also want a part that cannot be disconnected and only functions as a hinge...
While we're at it, could we be able to toggle the pivot with action groups?
Is it possible for someone smarter than I (read: a modder) to figure out how the did the Claw's pivot, and build a new part around it?
Possible? Yeah. Dunno if it's still being maintained, but there was that Damned Robotics mod which had a pivot hinge of some kind... I never got round to using it, though.
